verbs.description: [ARG0: John Oliver on Sunday 's " Last Week Tonight "] [V: mocked] [ARG1: AT&T] [ARG2: for paying Michael Cohen , President Trump 's personal attorney , for " insights into understanding " Trump 's thinking] .
